email_body: Can you swap me with Fletch. Try to make all of my interviews as late as possible. Thx John ---------------------- Forwarded by John Arnold/HOU/ECT on 09/29/2000 04:55 PM --------------------------- Enron North America Corp. From: Kimberly Hillis 09/29/2000 09:52 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT, Fletcher J Sturm/HOU/ECT@ECT, Kevin M Presto/HOU/ECT@ECT, Mark Dana Davis/HOU/ECT@ECT, Rogers Herndon/HOU/ECT@ect, John J Lavorato/Corp/Enron@Enron, David W Delainey/HOU/ECT@ECT, Greg Whalley/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Ina Rangel/HOU/ECT@ECT, Kay Chapman/HOU/ECT@ECT, Felicia Doan/HOU/ECT@ECT, Tamara Jae Black/HOU/ECT@ECT, Airam Arteaga/HOU/ECT@ECT, Jessica Ramirez/HOU/ECT@ECT Subject: Nigel Patterson Below please find a copy of the resume and the itinerary for Nigel Patterson. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to call me or John Lavorato. Thanks for you help. Kim x30681 12:30 - 1:00 Rogers Herndon (EB3320) 1:00 - 1:30 Kevin Presto (EB3320) 1:30 - 2:00 Dana Davis (EB3320) 2:00 - 2:30 Dave Delainey (EB3314) 2:30 - 3:00 John Arnold (EB3320) 3:15 - 4:00 Greg Whalley (EB2801) 4:00 - 4:30 Fletch Sturm (EB3320)
